```{python}
# 1) Load the raw text
with open("hw4_files/conlang.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    text = f.read()
```

## Normalize & Split

```{python}

import re

conlang_words = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", text.lower())
conlang_words = [w for w in conlang_words if w]
```

## Filter

```{python}

vowels = set("aeiouɜ")

no_v = []
yes_v = []

for wd in conlang_words:
    if any(ch in vowels for ch in wd):
        yes_v.append(wd)
    else:
        no_v.append(wd)
      
        
```

## Verify

```{python}
print(yes_v[:50], "AAAAAAAAAAAAA", no_v)
```

```{python}
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(yes_v[:30])
print()

print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(conlang_words))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(yes_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(no_v))

```
